note.p: Daughter of Richard and Caroline Wetherell of Westbury on Severn, Gloucestershire. Married Francis Henry Rich in Ticehurst, Sussex, in 1842. Anthony Rich’s sister-in-law.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 July 2017)
East Sussex Record Office, Brighton, England marriage register PAR 492/1/3/2 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 November 2022)
Gloucestershire, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1913 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 July 2017)
